PH janji tu give more subsidies ie: free education, RM1/litre ron95, turunkan harga barang (not sure how they gonna do this), naikkan salary, turunkan harga rumah, turunkan everything kek etc. Which means huge extra expenses needed than current.Yet they wanna pull out more tax ie; no gst, abolish/significantly reduce car tax etc, which means less revenue.They talk till the level it become illogical and sounds very irresponnsible just  for the sake of gaining votes. PH cant even resolve his own internal shit. Im sure if PH ever hold Putrajaya, more and more drama will pop up between all the parties in PH. Agree to disagree is bullshit and never gonna worked for long term.

Stop healthcare and education subsidies. Make rakyat pay in full and more to promote hardworking culture.Also fully privatize money sinks such as police and defence to reduce costs and increase efficiency.#sayapakarekonomi
